messages.message: It would be super helpful to be able to delete chat history.  Often i want to test something before a demo, but in the current state if I want a clean slate for demo purposes (i dont want to wait for the loading) i must create a chat, test, and then recreate the same scenario for demo

yes! this has come up a few times. And it's in the pipeline:
https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/DR-1873
Can one just delete the json? By chance
@joshbronko The user doesn't have access to the file system, so they cannot access/delete it. In the next version we are working on a more reliable chat storage.
